plot: Ben confronts an evil genetic manipulator who feels just as he does - sorely deprived of recognition and rewards for his astonishing capabilities.

Making a stop in Washington D.C., Ben uses the watch to stop crime and rescue people, but he wants some reward. Grandpa Max tries to teach him what a hero really is, but his first encounter with Dr. Animo, a scientist who can mutate and control animals, will really teach him.—Jesse Sanchez
